Torture Tower Doesn't Sleep

拷(ごう)問(もん)塔(とう)は(は)眠(ねむ)らない(らない)goumontou wa nemuranai

"Torture Moira"

"Don't worry, for your pain will continue on forever."
1

The story of the three sisters Gibbet, Rack, and Maiden torturing victims in their tower.

Lyrics

Versions

  • Original: The original version of the song uploaded to niconico on July 26, 2013. It was later featured on EVILS EXTRA.
  • Instrumental: An instrumental of the original linked from its niconico upload.

Albums

Notes

  • The PV was illustrated by Maruino and created by THETA.
  • mothy stated that the song was initially conceptualized as part of The Evillious Chronicles series, and chose to use VY1 to distinguish it from The Evillious Chronicles when he made it an independent story.
  • The song's title has also been translated as Sleepless Torture Tower.
  • The song was paired up with Unlock Blackbox [Instrumental] in supplementary material for EVILS EXTRA.
